colour.models.rgb.dataset.color_match_rgb Module¶

ColorMatch RGB Colourspace¶

Defines the ColorMatch RGB colourspace:

  • COLOR_MATCH_RGB_COLOURSPACE.

See also

RGB Colourspaces Jupyter Notebook

References

colour.models.rgb.dataset.color_match_rgb.COLOR_MATCH_RGB_PRIMARIES = array([[ 0.63 , 0.34 ], [ 0.295, 0.605], [ 0.15 , 0.075]])¶

ColorMatch RGB colourspace primaries.

COLOR_MATCH_RGB_PRIMARIES : ndarray, (3, 2)

colour.models.rgb.dataset.color_match_rgb.COLOR_MATCH_RGB_ILLUMINANT = 'D50'¶

ColorMatch RGB colourspace whitepoint name as illuminant.

COLOR_MATCH_RGB_ILLUMINANT : unicode

colour.models.rgb.dataset.color_match_rgb.COLOR_MATCH_RGB_WHITEPOINT = array([ 0.3457, 0.3585])¶

colour.models.rgb.dataset.color_match_rgb.XYZ_TO_COLOR_MATCH_RGB_MATRIX = array([[ 2.64164976, -1.22313179, -0.39291946], [-1.11207173, 2.05919502, 0.01596275], [ 0.08218196, -0.28076676, 1.45620209]])¶
